name: Hybrid Presence Samples part2 - Spideriini!
description:
Hybrid Experimental - Physics Samples



Sample 3 - Spideriini - VR + Ragdoll Arms
The Hybrid Presence system on the arms only, used in a Spiderman-like web swinging and wall climbing scenario!



Your arms are fully physically interactive and allow you to climb over ledges, push off walls, and even slow you down when moving fast!

Locomotion is handled in the same way as previous samples (See Garden Sample), but the run speed has been increased.

There are some small issues with elbows and with stuttering hands, but these will be fixed in upcoming samples.

Be sure to read the controls in the menu screen.


Try it and have some fun with Physics!


Like what you've seen? Be sure to check out my stuff on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/user/nimsony
